title: Ngai teh an ri a va mawi em
lyrics:
Ngai teh an ri a va mawi em!
Ni ropui lo thleng lawmin:
"Khawvel sual leh thlemna chungah,
Rem leng se," tiin an zai.

"Chungnung berah ropui rawh se,
Chungnung berah ropui rawh se";
Tiin an tingtang ri mawi nen,
"Rem fang se," tiin an zai.

Hmana Aigupta ang khanin,
Jubili a lo thleng e;
Ropui rawh se chungnung berah,
Salem thar rawn hawngtu chu.

Hmel hriatloh kar hla mi an ni,
Tlantu faka zaite chu;
Chatuan Rem Lal ropui fakin,
"Rem leng se," tiin an zai.

An va mawi em! an puan ropui.
An hmel ni aia eng nen;
An puan eng var ropui sinin.
"Rem leng se." tiin an zai.

Min hrilh rawh u. angelte u,
Van Lal Imanuela;
Alalthutthleng ropui pela,
Misual tana ilo kal hi.

Lo eng leh la, kan chungah hian.
Chhinchhiahna Varparh arsi;
Remna leng se, hmun tinah hian.
Tiin kan zaipui tawh ang.
